descriptions: Teams net points while player is on the court.
Teams net points while player is on the court.

videos.description: Kemba Walker hustles to grab the loose ball and goes coast-to-coast for the bucket, plus the foul.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Kemba absorbs contact for tough and-1) 2021/5/11 ESHEET

videos.headline: Kemba absorbs contact for tough and-1

videos.description: Grant Williams hits the deck trying to guard Bam Adebayo and is called for a foul after Adebayo hits the shot.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Bam Adebayo out muscles Williams for questionable and-1) 2021/5/11 ESHEET

videos.headline: Bam Adebayo out muscles Williams for questionable and-1

videos.description: As time winds down, Trevor Ariza races to score but Marcus Smart meets him at the basket with a big block.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Smart gets huge chase down block on Ariza) 2021/5/11 ESHEET

videos.headline: Smart gets huge chase down block on Ariza

videos.description: Jimmy Butler collides with Marcus Smart while trying to grab a rebound and suffers an eye injury.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Butler gets poked in the eye after colliding with Smart) 2021/5/11 ESHEET

videos.headline: Butler gets poked in the eye after colliding with Smart
